First Hunter's Spear.name: First Hunter's Spear
First Hunter's Spear.flavor: You throw your weapon at your foe, hitting it so hard that it’s distracted when your ally attacks.
First Hunter's Spear.requirement: You must be wielding a thrown weapon.
First Hunter's Spear.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and one of your allies gains combat advantage against the target until the end of your next turn.

Form of the First Hunter.name: Form of the First Hunter
Form of the First Hunter.flavor: You transform to resemble an ancient predator. You then hinder your foes and make a target vulnerable to your allies’ attacks.
Form of the First Hunter.effect:
You assume the guardian form of the first hunter until the end of the encounter. While you are in this form, you gain a +2 power bonus to saving throws. In addition, each enemy marked by you is slowed until the mark ends.
Once during this encounter, you can use the Form of the First Hunter Attack power while you are in this form.
Form of the First Hunter.requirement: The power Form of the First Hunter must be active in order to use this power.
Form of the First Hunter.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, your allies gain combat advantage against the target, and they gain a bonus to damage rolls against it equal to your Constitution modifier.

Marked Prey.name: Marked Prey
Marked Prey.flavor: When an enemy tries to slip away, you and a companion hunter close in for the kill.
Marked Prey.trigger: An enemy marked by you ends its turn farther from you than where it started its turn
Marked Prey.effect: You and one ally can each shift half your speed as a free action to squares closer to the triggering enemy.
